description: This standing offer is for two years with an option to extend for three additional one year periods. The estimated value for this opportunity is in the range of $500,001 to $1,000,000
full_summary:
**Standing Offer Invitation: RISO-W6898-240695_A Delta Orcaview Energy Management Systems**
=============================================

### Tender Information

* **Tender Reference Number:** WS4491208093-Doc4498259388
* **Solicitation Number:** WS4491208093
* **Publication Date:** March 21, 2024
* **Tender Closing Date:** April 9, 2024, 2:00 PM (Eastern Time)

### Contract Details

* **Contract Type:** Request for Standing Offer
* **Procurement Category:** Service
* **Estimated Value:** $500,001 to $1,000,000
* **Term:** Two years, with the option to extend for three additional one-year periods

### Description of Work

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) invites bidders to submit a standing offer for the maintenance and support of the Delta Orcaview and Enteliweb Energy Management System at Canadian Forces Base Gagetown in Oromocto, New Brunswick. This standing offer is a request to furnish all necessary labor, materials, tools, and equipment to maintain the energy management system, as required.

### Selection Criteria

* **Selection Method:** Lowest Price

### Eligibility and Trade Agreements

This bid is open to all qualified contractors. The successful bidder must comply with the Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA) and other applicable trade agreements.

### Contact Information

* **Name:** Gary Bryant
* **Email:** [gary.bryant@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:gary.bryant@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
* **Department:** Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)

### Notice and Registration

To access this opportunity, please log in to SAP Ariba at [https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/19174007](https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/19174007). For more information, please refer to the tender description.

This entry only includes essential information and is written in clear and concise language for the readers. All important details like contact information and logging-in instructions are provided to facilitate the bid process.
